comment:
Closed form of ~ ancoms . The following user's proof is completed by invoking mmj2's unify command and using mmj2's StepSelector to pick all remaining steps of the Metamath proof.
1:: ` |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( ps /\ ph ) ) `
qed:1,?: ~ e0a ` |- ( ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) <-> ( ( ps ` ` /\ ph ) -> ch ) ) `
The proof of ~ ancomst is derived automatically from it. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Dec-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
